document_data.name: Scuud
document_data.Description: Scuuds were white, fleshy, and on average grew to the size of a [[human]]'s fist. They tasted like a cross between a [[potato]] ad a [[radish]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], a group of [[goblin]]s and [[orc]]s living within the [[Dungeon Level]] of [[Undermountain]] had scuuds stored with other food for animal feed.
document_data.Usage: This vegetable was typically used for similar purposes as potatoes.
